summary: An under-appreciated intern entrusted with a million-dollar necklace races to find out which of his money-hungry roommates betrayed him as he battles a desperate criminal duo bent on stealing.
cast: Mark L. Young|Scout Taylor-Compton|Tania Raymonde|Beau Knapp|Lili Simmons|Jesse Medeles|Keith David|Bryan Callen|AJ Michalka|Aqueela Zoll|Francia Raisa|Troy Evans|Katrina Begin|Doug Haley|Kevin Porter|Ilia Yordanov|Steve Wilder|Carlos Javier Castillo|Fernando Chien|Nicolas Charles|Vito D'Amico|Cher Santiago|Meg Vora
title: Dirty Lies
